detailed_description:
900 is a circular swiping game in which the player controls an entity that must absorb universes in order to grow endlessly.

900 is a minimalist action, score attack game. The game is very hard, so be warned that your reflexes, accuracy and skills will be tested.

There are leaderboards to compare your performance with other players.

short_description: 900 is a circular swiping game in which the player controls an entity that must absorb universes in order to grow endlessly.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Spanish*
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“Wow, that was an adventure. This is a trippy, trippy fun time.”
Unlimited Ammo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (2.8 Mghz)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 130
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Best played with a mouse.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: Intel i5 (2.8 Mghz)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 230
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Best played with a mouse.
